text: Patrick Baumann (5 August 1967 â€“ 14 October 2018) was a Swiss basketball executive, player and coach. He was the President of the Global Association of International Sports Federations and Secretary General of the International Basketball Federation (FIBA). Baumann was born in Basel on 5 August 1967 and died of a heart attack while attending the 2018 Youth Olympics in Buenos Aires, Argentina, on 14 October 2018. == References == Category:1967 births Category:2018 deaths Category:Basketball players Category:Basketball coaches Category:Sportspeople from Basel Category:Deaths from myocardial infarction
title: Patrick Baumann (basketball)
